desc: Our ultimate goal is to improve the way we all react to Cardiac Fitness, Disease and Stress using SanketLife. CVD and Stress is one of the prominent causes of increasing heart-related ailments and shocking deaths. SanketLife monitors your Cardiac Health, HRV & stress easily for you! Made by India, Made for India !
